meanings.definition: A person from the same village or town as oneself.
meanings.sent1: My paesans and I grew up together in the small village.
meanings.sent2: I always enjoy catching up with my paesans from back home.
meanings.sent3: When my paesans and I get together, it's like a mini reunion!
meanings.sent4: The bond between paesans is as strong as the roots of a tree.
meanings.sent5: The image of my paesans laughing around a bonfire is etched in my memory.

meanings.sent1: My paesans always have my back no matter what.
meanings.sent2: I consider my paesans to be like family to me.
meanings.sent3: Going on a road trip with my paesans is always an adventure.
meanings.sent4: In times of trouble, true paesans shine like beacons of light.
meanings.sent5: The laughter shared with paesans is the sweetest music to my ears.
